title: Compilation: animal movie
brief_description: Animal movie (Canada): An animated film to help children understand how animals move. “Martin the cobbler” (U.S.): A clay animated film about a Russian shoemaker who discovers new meanings in life by meditating on old truths. “Model railroading unlimited” (U.S.): A young man’s absorption in model railroading serves as the source of comedy.
